nodes.goal: Isolate variable c on one side of the first equation
nodes.plan: Subtract -42*r from both sides, then divide by 27

nodes.goal: Isolate variable r on one side of the second equation
nodes.plan: Subtract 4*c from both sides, then divide by 130

nodes.goal: Express c in terms of r using the first equation's result
nodes.plan: Substitute isolated c into second equation

nodes.goal: Solve for r using the modified second equation
nodes.plan: Apply algebraic manipulations to isolate r
